triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The paper surveys deep neural networks combined with reinforcement learning for multiagent systems.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core machine learning paradigm that forms the foundation of the multiagent RL systems discussed.

triples.name: Multi-agent reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The central focus of this survey which examines combining deep learning with multiagent RL.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Underlying theoretical framework for understanding multiagent interactions and strategic decision-making.

triples.name: Centralized system
triples.relevance: Addresses centralized training paradigm as one of five key research areas in multiagent RL.

triples.name: Decentralized system
triples.relevance: Addresses decentralized execution paradigm as complement to centralized training approaches.

triples.name: Curse of dimensionality
triples.relevance: Major computational challenge identified in multiagent RL that approaches struggle to overcome.

triples.name: Stationary process
triples.relevance: Nonstationarity in multiagent environments violates stationarity assumptions, a key challenge identified.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Broader framework for understanding systems with multiple interacting agents in shared environments.

triples.name: Behavioral game theory
triples.relevance: Psychology and sociology approaches that capture relevant behaviors for communication and coordination.
